revised_title: Stanley George Hooker: A Pioneering Engineer and Scientist
tldr: The article is a biographical memoir of Stanley George Hooker, a renowned engineer and scientist who made significant contributions to aeronautics, gas turbines, and jet engines. Hooker's work focused on mathematical methods and innovative solutions in fluid dynamics. He is known for his research on wind tunnels, jet engine design, and his pioneering work on gas turbines. His achievements and personality are highlighted, emphasizing his understated approach and focus on problem-solving.
